post.body: What a great review!!!!
Wow. *hugs* Yay for great neighbors!
Oh honey...wow. LOL! You just might lolol. What did you pick up ?
WOW. That's a lot of books!
Honey, you want it, I probably got it. Scrapbooks, paper, tapes, sorting kits.
*hugs* are you okay???
It's about 40 deg here and the wind is sharp. No rain today. :(
LOLOL! the smell of burned hair is a horrible one. I'm glad you decided to nix that one LOLOL!
YAY! Good luck with your pre-writing. :)
That's great! Now if only I could get myself motivated. *sigh*
Try to at least wait a bit before dying again. You don't want to chemically burn your hair.
I loved it! Thank you. :)
That's excellent! Will you start writing it tonight? And no worries, it's just one of those nights. LOL! I'll catch up tom.
Mornin' twitterpals. Am trying to write this morning. It's 5am for me...not quite as early as I'd like, but it's early enough LOL
I'm thankful for a restful night at home. :)
Anyone willing to take a ton of creative memories stuff off my hands?
blogged a bit about finding your writing groove http://tinyurl.com/7hewl5
Writing night was a bust. Kiddo's just gone through a growth spurt so every attempted run is met with face plants. He's not happy. :(
naruto fix ended. time to go write on the asus. I looove that laptop. See you all later!
Watching Naruto Shippuden. It's a sickness, really, but I need to catch up. :)
